          <title>
            <string language="en">Current flow round a circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktueller Fluß ringsum einen Stromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écoulement actuel autour d'un circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fluxo atual em volta de um circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Flusso corrente intorno ad un circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρούσα ροή γύρω από ένα κύκλωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Flujo actual alrededor de un circuito</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This circuit diagrams show the correct (left) and incorrect (right) ideas on current flow around a circuit.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit components</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Schaltpläne zeigen die korrekten (link) 
und falschen (rechten) Ideen auf aktuellem Fluß um einen Stromkreis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les schémas de circuit ce montrent (bonnes) les 
idées correctes (gauche) et incorrectes sur l'écoulement actuel 
autour d'un circuit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os diagramas deste circuito mostram as idéias 
(direitas) corretas (esquerdo) e incorretas no fluxo atual em torno de
um circuito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schemi circuitali questo mostrano (giuste) le 
idee corrette (di sinistra) ed errate su flusso corrente intorno ad un
circuito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα διαγράμματα αυτών των κυκλωμάτων εμφανίζουν σωστές
(αριστερός) και ανακριβείς (δεξιά) ιδέες σχετικά με την παρούσα 
ροή γύρω από ένα κύκλωμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los esquemas circulares este muestran las ideas 
(derechas) correctas (izquierdo) e incorrectas en flujo actual 
alrededor de un circuito.</string>
          </description>
